title: Not receiving chests that my profile states are available
body:
Wondering why I'm not getting any chests for games where I get an S- or higher even though my profile says I have chests available. 

I have reported the "bug" a couple times now, and a friend that was in a pre-made with me that also did not receive a chest reported it. 

Just wondering why, and why no one has gotten back to me. I get its a small issues but still...

replies.body: Which match was it specifically? It could have been due to the fact that you had already obtained a mastery chest with that particular champion, but it's hard for me to know exactly what could have happened without the match in question.

Sorry for the slower reply, the comment up there wasn't an actual *reply* to me so it won't notify me of the comment!

You do only get one mastery chest per champion *per season*. Once the new season starts you can get those chests again.
Okay, thank you. Sorry for the hassle then. They should display that somewhere more easily seen

Do I only receive one mastery chest per champion? Say I get a chest once with Ashe, does that mean I can never get a chest again while playing Ashe? The most recent match I didn't receive a chest for was the most recent game I played with Soraka.
